title._content: [Abraham Lincoln campaign button for 1860 presidential election]  (LOC)

description._content: [Abraham Lincoln campaign button for 1860 presidential election] 1860. 2 photographs in 1 frame : tintype ; 2.5 cm diameter (frame) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (DLC/PP-2012:127). Purchased from: Walnut's Antiques, Brewster, Mass., 2011. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Lincoln, Abraham,--1809-1865--Associated objects. Presidential elections--1860. Campaign insignia--1860. Format: Buttons (Information artifacts)--1860. Portrait photographs--1860. Tintypes--1860. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.31540 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2709
